text: Love Is All You Need (, Lit.: The Bald Hairdresser) is a 2012 Danish Swedish French Italian German romantic comedy movie directed by Susanne Bier and starring Pierce Brosnan, Trine Dyrholm, Kim Bodnia, Paprika Steen, Micky Skeel Hansen, Line Kruse and Bodil JÃ¸rgensen. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2012 romantic comedy movies Category:2012 LGBT movies Category:Danish romance movies Category:Danish comedy movies Category:Danish LGBT movies Category:Swedish romance movies Category:Swedish comedy movies Category:Swedish LGBT movies Category:French romance movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Italian LGBT movies Category:German romance movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German LGBT movies Category:Cancer in movies Category:Movies about weddings Category:Movies directed by Susanne Bier Category:Movies set in Copenhagen Category:Movies set in Italy
title: Love Is All You Need
